# Data sources


```{r, include=FALSE}
setwd(dirname(rstudioapi::getActiveDocumentContext()$path))
source("srcs/helpers.R")
```

```{r}
train = fread("data/input/train.csv")
test = fread("data/input/test.csv")
imdb %>%
  inner_join(train, by = c("tconst"="imdb_id")) -> imdb_budget
save(imdb_budget, file = "data/processing/imdb_budget.RData")
```


```{r}
imdb %>%
  inner_join(train, by = c("tconst"="imdb_id")) -> imdb_budget



imdb_budget %>%
  filter(primaryTitle != title & originalTitle != title)

imdb_budget %>%
  filter(genres.x !=  genres.y)



colnames(train)
train %>%
  select(tconst = imdb_id, revenue, budget, genres)

imdb %>%
  select(tconst, genres)

imdb_budget %>%
  plot_missing()
  glimpse()
test
```
